msg: Remove reader dependency on Spring - only the Controller implementation should be dependant on Spring to facilitate the use of other containers

author: rgardler
msg: Can't getCLass of a null object (run tests bfore committing)

author: tfischer
msg: Fixed a synchronisation issue in the getDateString() method of postgresql: removed instance variable of SimpleDateFormat and replaced by local instantiation.
According to the docs, SimpleDateFormat is not threadsafe and thus must either be
instantiated locally or access must be synchronized.

author: tfischer
msg: Mentioned fixing the escapeText() method in several db adapters in changes.xml
